reviewText: Sam Elliott does it again!!!! awesome features, once again his movies are great. You cant go wrong with Sam and all the movies he is in.

I AM IN THE PROCESS OF REPLACING MY COLLECTION OF VHS TAPES WITH DVD'S. I HAVE WELL OVER 10.000 MOVIES IN MY COLLECTION. THEREFORE I AM ORDERING THESE FROM AMAZON. HAVING A MOVIE SET LIKE SAM ELLOTT TRIPLE SAVES ME BOTH TIME AND MONEY. I WAS VERY SATISFIED WITH THIS PRODUCT. THE PRICE WAS RIGHT,THE PRODUCT ARRIVED ON TIME AND THE ART WORK AND COVER WAS IN MENT CONDITION. THE MOVIES PLAYED WITHOUT A HITCH. I WAS VERY HAPPY, KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK. I'LL BE ORDERING MANY, MANY MORE DVD'S.
I wanted the movie "I will fight no more forever".  The other movies, I personally don't think are that good.
The sources they copied these films from must have been AWFUL.  There's no bargain here whatsoever. Very, very disappointing.
I'm a fan of Sam Elliot

I enjoyed this group of movies very much. I took a day and watched all three at once. What a treat that was.
I really liked 'I Will Fight No More Forever'. The others were good to, but this is also history.

My husband and I love westerns, and the Sam Elliot triple feature had three very good westerns.
We have spent evenings enjoying the movies.
Sam Elliott is at his usual best on these 3 movies. I usually buy anything with Sam Elliott starring in it, and this was not a disappointment for me.
Three stars because it was pretty good and being a Sam Elliott fan I had to buy it.  Worth the price.
